<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Boulder Seed](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1903)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=21" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 44 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This bomb is made of volatile fluids that rapidly expand and harden when exposed to air. A boulder seed grants an item bonus to attack rolls and deals bludgeoning damage and bludgeoning splash damage, according to the bomb's type. When activated, the bomb fills a 5-foot cube with hardened foam, which has stats according to the bomb's type and which [pushes](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) a primary target of a certain size or smaller occupying that space 5 feet away from you. On a critical hit, the target also falls [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). The splash zone fills with rubble, creating difficult terrain. The “boulder” the bomb creates fails all saving throws and loses 1 Hardness per round, disintegrating into fine powder when the boulder's Hardness is reduced to 0. At that time, the difficult terrain the bomb created also disappears.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Standard"
>
Boulder Seed
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 44 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 360 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls, and the bomb deals 3d4 bludgeoning damage plus 3 bludgeoning splash damage. It creates a boulder as hard as wood (Hardness 5, HP 20) that pushes Medium or smaller targets.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 18"
pfs="Standard"
>
Boulder Seed (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 44 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 3,600 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls, and the bomb deals 4d4 bludgeoning damage plus 4 bludgeoning splash damage. It creates a boulder as hard as stone (Hardness 10, HP 40) that pushes Large or smaller targets.
